message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for someone like you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further and finding a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price you've proposed. I would like to make a counteroffer of $900,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your position, the value of this product is quite significant.  I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. I believe this price point reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product.
